title: Bugsplat Error...
body:
I have never gotten this error, EVER.. only today and its been driving me crazy i get in the game everythings is good and then randomly it just bugsplants mostly when i fight though... literally had like 15 bugsplats in 30 minutes... 
i even reinstalled a clean windows 10 to fix it but it wont help :(
i have directx 12, latest nvidia drivers, windows updates everything...
and my computer is really good so it cant be the problem.
also internet is 90mb down, 3 up its good too i guess having a usual 72ping.
also before i did the windows format i had directx errors which are so stupid since everything is up to date i just dont know what to do.

replies.body: Typically those bugsplats are a decent sign that some of the game files are corrupted or missing. Try running a quick repair through the game client if you haven't yet, and if that doesn't help check out the steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) as well.
